title: Keir Starmer – 2022 Comments on Anniversary of Srebrenica Genocide
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 11 July 2022.
content:
On the 27th anniversary of the genocide at Srebrenica, we remember the 8,000 Muslim men and boys who lost their lives and commend the dignity of those who survived.
